name: TalkNerdytoMe
0:
”Alexa, talk nerdy”
”tell me a fact”
”Alexa, ask talk nerdy for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk nerdy
des:
There's a little bit of nerd in all of us. And we need to be reminded every now and then that there's nothing wrong with knowing how to identify a number that's divisible by 7, or what number sequence forms a palindrome when multiplied by itself. Open your mind, expand your horizons, and ask this skill for a fact. We've sourced facts that are both interesting, engaging, and will bring out the kid who fell in love with imaginary numbers with your imaginary friends.

FEEDBACK
Email us at feedback@talknerdy.app if you have any issues or feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
